Constructor Detail

Device

public Device(String id,
              String initialState,
              boolean isGateway)
Parameters:
id - the identifier of the device as network element of the simulation.
isGateway - defines if the current devices is a gateway or not. A gateway device (an only gateway devices) can be connected with multiple scenarios.
initialState - the state in which the device has to be initialized.
